# extended line scans not executed in 2019-2020 winter season.

frame:
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --frame 1 30 130 0.04 80 280 0.04

line (called by frame, during snowfall event):
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --line 1 30 130 0.04 185 120
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --line 1 55 65 0.02 174 30 spectralon

line_extended (called every 15 min, during a snowfall event):
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --line 1 30 130 0.04 185 150 extended
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --line 1 55 65 0.02 174 30 spectralon_extended

 Snowfall event parameters:
  - if [ $snowcount -gt 15 ] && [ $snowcount2 -gt 15 ]; then

SOP Matrix:
# Scanner to Local coordinate system transformation matrix.
-0.0251928921643300 -0.9993704199069796 0.0249816450088653 -7.6794690010699251
0.8548942246749690 -0.0344908354620577 -0.5176545627895919 4.6470673286048109
0.5181902959530662 0.0083154486382300 0.8552249240567654 2922.7305067096698000
0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 1.0000000000000000

POP Matrix:
#Local to global coordinate system transformation matrix.
0.8743740040000000 0.2963631640000000 -0.3842381770000000 -2453789.2369902502000000
-0.4852526170000000 0.5340151450000000 -0.6923566440000000 -4421469.2432708928000000
0.0000000000000000 0.7918312320000000 0.6107399610000000 3874145.9124886298000000
